extracted_playbook.title: Update Solar-Log Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install the latest firmware version 6.2.0-170 for Solar-Log Base 15 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet by minimizing network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use secure methods such as VPNs for remote access, ensuring VPNs are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed on the CISA ICS webpage.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor and Report Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to monitor and report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
